Description: Book of the Dead of Irtyru; frame 2.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: Wüthrich, A. and Stöhr, S., Ba-Bringer und Schattenabschneider : Untersuchungen zum so genannten Totenbuchkapitel 191 auf Totenbuchpapyri (Studien zum altägyptischen Totenbuch 18, Wiesbaden, 2012): 9-10, pl. 3. Mosher, Malcom Jr. 2016. The Book of the Dead, Saite through Ptolemaic periods : a study of traditions evident in versions of texts and vignettes (SPBD Studies), vol. I (BD Spells 1-15) and II (BD Spells 16, 18-30), Charleston.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (57495) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/57495)
